description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cic8k","text":"This Protocol is intended for human Thymus single cell dissociation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bnen","text":"It includes tissue preservation and handling, Enzymatic dissociation, FACS an MACS enrichments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb7or","text":"Developed In the Teichmann lab at the Sanger institute, Wellcome Gemone Campus, UK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9omc3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mc6e","text":"VK, CS and JP contributed equally  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"90b36","text":"This protocol comes as is with the purpose of knowledge sharing and open science, however there is no guarantee this protocol will work although we strongly believe it will. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ethjn","text":"a)    9.35 ml RPMI ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"210vm","text":"b)    640 ul type IV collagenase stock (stock 50mg/ml from freezer -20ᵒC, final conc. 3.2mg/ml) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0r7o","text":"c)    10 ul DNase I stock aliquot (DNase I aliquot from -20ᵒC, use at 1:1000 dilution)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj26a","text":"d)    Prewarm in water bath ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58kl0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dh60m","text":"DM2 - Digestion media II: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b91ie","text":"a)    9.79 ml RPMI ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85pct","text":"b)    200 ul Liberase TH (2.5mg/ml stock, 50X, final 50ug/ml) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fge0p","text":"c)    10 ul DNase I stock aliquot ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mems","text":"d)    Prewarm in water bath","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9c4he","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgur8","text":"Stop solution: 2% FBS in RPMI (40 ml RPMI + 800 ul FBS), Keep on ice ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":44,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11p4q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24t9l","text":"FACS buffer: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63gc2","text":"a)    49.55 ml PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amokt","text":"b)    250 ul 100% FBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nkul","text":"c)    200 ul 0.5M EDTA (final 0.5% FBS + 2mM EDTA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":6,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct1g2","text":"d)    Keep on ice {"blocks":[{"key":"6nhta","text":"When sample arrives measure weight and size, and take note of time of arrival, patient number and storage type. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57vtl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4olab","text":"Histology (Optional):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pki0","text":"Divide sample 2 ways ( ½ for histology – ½ for dissociation) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6375c","text":"- 1/3 for snap freezing ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac40f","text":"- 1/3 for OCT mounting ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k9gt","text":"- 1/3 for FFPE","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6toe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmd5m","text":"Tissue dissociation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6td2i","text":"Divide sample 4 ways:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"384kn","text":"- 1/4 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq14p","text":"    -- for 10% DMSO 90% FBS freezing (small chunks of 3-4mm)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdskq","text":"    -- Keep small part for RNAlater – place 1 ml of RNAlater in cryovial, add sample, top up with more RNAlater, store in - 80ᵒC freezer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1skta","text":"- 1/4 for collagenase type IV digestion (DM1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"434fd","text":"- 2/4 for liberase TH digestion (DM2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ir5o","text":"1.    Prepare hood (wipe with 70% EtOH); bring sterile petri dishes and scalpels and digestion solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52jne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qrs9","text":"2.    Place tissue onto petri dish (in the hood), remove any attached fat. If fat tissue is not clear proceed with whole sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ps6a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccg3f","text":"3.    Mince the tissue and put it into 2 x 50ml falcon tube filled with DM1or DM2 (depending on size of tissue (2-3     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6lk1","text":"       cm2)– add appropriate volume of digestion media i.e. if big add 40ml)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jqlj","text":"        a. Do not use pipet tips as this can be sticky","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bu246","text":"        b. Use scalpel to carry minced tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8kn7u","text":"        c. Wash scalpel with digestion solution to put all remaining tissue into the falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dq8k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pipt","text":"4.    Incubate at 37ᵒCon the rotator (put on middle speed, check the tissue every 10 minutes). Don’t go more than 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11hc6","text":"        hour. If liberase doesn’t look digested then top up with double the concentration of liberase \u0026 dnaseI.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fvalh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drf3m","text":"5.    Filter through strainer (leave the undigested tissue to settle to bottom) and add 10ml of stop solution. Leave aside","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":96,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sah2","text":"       on ice and label either “with DM1” or “with DM2”. Cells digested with DM1 will be banked (in 90% FBS/10% DMSO) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93ase","text":"       AFTER SORTING. Cells digested with DM2 will be FACS sorted for EpCAM+ (i.e. thymic epithelial cells) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":7,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"daql4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46cvl","text":"6.    Combine the undigested tissue from DM1 and DM2 and add Trypsin – EDTA (0.25%) (pre-warm ~15mL Trypsin at ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pf4f","text":"        37ᵒC) for further digestion (limit to 15min) – add DNAseI at 1000x concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pmp3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3q2f","text":"7.    Incubate at 37ᵒC on the rotator (put on middle speed, check the tissue every 10 minutes). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ffh4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37mjs","text":"8.    While trypsin digestion is occurring, spin down the 50ml tubes from digestion I and digestion II in 500g at 4ᵒC for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22n18","text":"        5min to pellet the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l127","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9e1en","text":"9.    Leave 20mL RBC lysis buffer at room temp. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a68df","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3v9v3","text":"10.   If the cells appear visibly red, resuspend cell pellet in 10ml 1x RBC lysis buffer. Incubate for 3-5min at RT. Then ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4leu9","text":"        top up with PBS to 40ml. Strain through strainer. Centrifuge 500g for 5min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96ihc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gc37","text":"11.   Resuspend the cells in 5ml of stop solution. Count cells. Cells digested with trypsin will be FACS sorted for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db7jk","text":"        CD45- (i.e. stromal cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ua91","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"216bp","text":"12.    Once trypsin digestion is done, spin down the 50ml tube in 500g at 4C for 5min to pellet the cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uojj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erc9d","text":"13.    If the cells appear visibly red, resuspend cell pellet in 5ml 1x RBC lysis buffer. Incubate for 3-5min at RT. Then top ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lq1b","text":"        up with PBS to 40ml. Strain through strainer. Centrifuge 500g for 5min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en45","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62l4p","text":"14.    Resuspend the cells in 5ml of stop solution. Count cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8igjk","text":"MACS enrichment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au4co","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"476d5","text":"In the next steps prepare 3 vials and profile them on 5’ 10X V(D)J:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":67}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78jd","text":"a.Total cell fraction;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85e1d","text":"b.CD45 depleted cell fraction; ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4kv8r","text":"c.EPCAM enriched cell fraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2itfn","text":"Note: Use LS (enrichment) columns for both CD45 depletion and EPCAM enrichment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2etb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2d58","text":"Magnetic sorting (CD 45+ depletion and EPCAM+ enrichment) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75ide","text":"        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ce1ug","text":"15.    Prepare solutions \u0026 equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fn58i","text":"        a.    MACS Buffer: PBS + 0.5% BSA + 2mM EDTA: keep cold and degase ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l6m3","text":"        b.    LS MACS columns and separators","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3si23","text":"        c.    CD45 MicroBeads, human (130-045-801) 2mL total (10 mkl per 107 cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":75,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7sebs","text":"        d.    CD326 (EpCAM) MicroBeads, human (130-061-101)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ertn","text":"    *Use cells up to 10^7 (*for higher volumes, scale up) with 20 ul of MicroBeads (magnetic labelling);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o7b","text":"    ** Use cells up to 10^8 (*for higher volumes, scale up) with 500 ul of buffer (separation);","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5pvk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drfi8","text":"16.    Determine cell numbers which would be used for the total fraction, sorting of EPCAM+ \u0026 CD45- cells, separate it ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f58pt","text":"        in three vials. Following on that, centrifuge cells that will be used for magnetic sorting at 300*g for 10min -\u003e ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fm3of","text":"        resuspend  cell pellet in 80ul of buffer per 10^7 cells;","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"808pv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a98d","text":"17.    Add 20ul of CD45/ EPCAM MicroBeads per each 10^7 cells -\u003e Mix well and incubate for 15 mins (CD45) and 30  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dkr7","text":"        min (EPCAM) at 4’C. (in the refrigerator)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rql8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dl6v","text":"18.     Wash cells by adding 1-2 ml buffer per 10^7 cells and centrifuge at 300g for 10min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b3gb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ccjh","text":"19.     Discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hvs8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekve9","text":"20.     Resuspend up to 10^8 cells in 500ul buffer (*for higher volumes, scale up).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hd4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bh5i","text":"Enrichment and depletion with LS columns","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6igr6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6js8s","text":"21.    Prepare 2*LS Columns (CD45 – and EPCAM + ) by rinsing with 3mL of degassed buffer. Discard effluent and","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqvo9","text":"         change collection tube (use LS column immediately). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjd20","text":"22.    Apply CD45 and EPCAM stained cell suspensions onto the appropriate columns:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nmt1","text":"        !(CD45- fraction) Collect cells that pass through (unlabeled cell fraction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e5ed","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8011n","text":"23.    Wash columns by adding 3 ml of buffer 3 times (CD45) or 4 times (EPCAM), waiting for column reservoir to be       ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77hi9","text":"         empty.  !(CD45- fraction) Collect washing buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":17,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"oh2r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apunc","text":"24.    Remove column from the separator and place it on collection tube, add 5ml of MACS buffer onto the column,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4l4m","text":"         immediately flush out fraction with magnetically labelled cells:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cncjo","text":"          !(EPCAM+ fraction)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":10,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6r1vb","text":"25.    Spin down the cells, resuspend in small volume and count for 10X loading. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqb34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rk4n","text":"Reconstitution for liberase TH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1il7","text":"Reconstitute the lyophilized enzyme with injection-quality sterile water or tissue-dissociation buffer. Do not add serum or other components such as albumin or protease inhibitors, to the dissociation buffer. Enzyme stability is reduced at higher concentrations and warmer temperatures (4 °C). Avoid both the above conditions.

Reconstitute the entire vial. Do not weigh individual aliquots of the lyophilizate. The introduction of moisture into the vial results in a decline in enzymatic activity.

Place vial on ice to rehydrate the lyophilized enzyme.
Gently agitate the vial at 2 to 8 °C until enzyme is completely dissolved (max. 30 min).

2 ml (1 vial with 5 mg–10 mg pack size), 10 ml (1 vial with 50 mg–100 mg pack size)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":500,"length":54},{"style":"bold","offset":555,"length":88}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhkkq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91dsj","text":"     Weight      Stock concentration      Vol. water      Aliquots        5mg      2.5mg/ml      2ml      5 x 400ul    ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":119}],"data":{}},{"key":"fknih","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["  Weight  ","  Stock concentration  ","  Vol. water  ","  Aliquots  "],["  5mg  ","  2.5mg/ml  ","  2ml  ","  5 x 400ul   "]],"guid":"70F9905A15A111ECBC2E0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["  Weight  ","  Stock concentration  ","  Vol. water  ","  Aliquots  "],["  5mg  ","  2.5mg/ml  ","  2ml  ","  5 x 400ul   "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}
